segments.text: I'm just taking in this everyday kitchen view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is methodically drying her plate with the towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's running, but the basin's full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflow is happening quietly onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands there unaware, one foot submerged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the boy's on the stool reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookie jar's open, his hand inside grabbing treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts dangerously, holding on by a thread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Little girl nearby, arm up in hopeful anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a neat garden path outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a mix of routine and hidden excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stacked dishes waiting their turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene feels full of potential surprises.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a typical family moment unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR
